workflow.name: 60-nfsserver
workflow.longdesc: Configure an NFS server. Requires an existing filesystem resource, for example a filesystem running on LVM on DRBD.

parameters.stepdesc: Specify the ID of the base filesystem resource which is to be exported via NFS.

parameter.name: base-id
parameter.longdesc: The ID of an exising filesystem resource.

template.name: rootfs
template.stepdesc: A virtual file system root export. Only needed for NFSv4 clients.

template.name: virtual-ip
template.stepdesc: Configure a Virtual IP address used to access the NFS mounts.

workflow.crm_script:
group g-nfs
order base-then-nfs inf: g-nfs colocation nfs-with-base inf: g-nfs
